name: conversations.kick
desc: Removes a user from a conversation.

channel.desc: ID of conversation to remove user from.

errors.cant_kick_self: Authenticated user can't kick themselves from a channel.
errors.method_not_supported_for_channel_type: This type of conversation cannot be used with this method.
errors.missing_scope: The calling token is not granted the necessary scopes to complete this operation.
errors.not_in_channel: User was not in the channel.
errors.not_supported: This is not supported for this channel and user combination.
errors.restricted_action: A team preference prevents the authenticated user from kicking.
